message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.

I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $9,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 represents the value I place on this product, I understand your perspective. Could you meet me at $11,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $9,250. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
